# testRlib

This is meant to be a personal project for me to learn how to create R packages of my own.

## Ideas for future

* Create an algorithm from scratch
* Do something with Rcpp
* Add documentation
* Add vignettes
* Add tests

## Resources I am using

[R packages](http://r-pkgs.had.co.nz/) by Hadley Wickham

[Writing an R package from scratch](https://hilaryparker.com/2014/04/29/writing-an-r-package-from-scratch/) blog post from Hilary Parker
